New Records: Luis Arraez has the longest single-season streak of 110 plate appearances without a strikeout since 2004.
Manny Machado is close to surpassing Nate Colbert's franchise home run lead with his next homer.
Key Match Events: The Padres were short-handed without Fernando Tatis Jr. and Jackson Merrill, impacting their performance.
Grant McCray hit two home runs, contributing to the Giants' victory.
Pre-Game Insights: The Padres were without key players, affecting their lineup strength.
Post-Match Reflections: Players and the manager expressed frustration with the loss and looked forward to the next game.
The loss was seen as a missed opportunity to increase their Wild Card lead.
